results.description: Championship side Stoke City sign Feirense midfielder Oghenekaro Etebo for £6.35m (7.2m euros) on a five-year deal.
results.title: Oghenekaro Etebo: Stoke City sign Feirense midfielder for £6.35m

results.description: Gareth Bale scores twice as Real Madrid prepare for their upcoming Champions League game at Juventus with victory at Las Palmas.
results.title: Las Palmas 0-3 Real Madrid

results.description: Follow live text commentary as Sevilla host Barcelona, Juventus take on AC Milan and PSG play Monaco in the French League Cup final.
results.title: Saturday's European Football: Barcelona, Juventus, AC Milan, PSG, Monaco

results.description: Former West Ham striker Jonathan Calleri's penalty helps lowly Las Palmas hold La Liga leaders Barcelona.
results.title: Las Palmas 1-1 Barcelona

results.description: La Liga leaders Barcelona's unbeaten record is on the line tonight in the Canary Islands - follow live text commentary.
results.shortTitle: Las Palmas v Barcelona - Barca held by minnows
results.title: La Liga live: Las Palmas v Barcelona

results.description: Former Chelsea striker Loic Remy joins Spanish La Liga side Getafe on loan for the rest of the season
results.shortTitle: Remy joins Getafe on loan for season
results.title: Loic Remy: Former Chelsea striker joins Getafe on loan

results.description: Girona forward Michael Olunga becomes the first Kenyan to score a hat-trick in Spain's La Liga as they beat Las Palmas 6-0.
results.title: Girona's Michael Olunga becomes first Kenyan to score La Liga hat-trick

results.description: Real Madrid welcome Las Palmas to the Santiago Bernabeu in La Liga - follow live text, images, social media and analysis.
results.shortTitle: Asensio scores incredible goal for Real Madrid
results.title: La Liga: Real Madrid v Las Palmas

results.description: Barcelona announce 25 minutes before kick-off that their game against Las Palmas goes ahead behind closed doors following unrest in the city.
results.shortTitle: Barca game goes ahead behind closed doors despite referendum unrest
results.title: Barcelona v Las Palmas goes ahead despite Catalan referendum unrest

results.description: Swansea City sign Spanish midfielder Roque Mesa from Las Palmas for £11m on a four-year deal.
results.shortTitle: Swansea sign Las Palmas midfielder Mesa
results.title: Roque Mesa: Swansea City sign Spanish midfielder from Las Palmas

results.description: Juventus lose to Roma as they miss the opportunity to wrap up the Serie A title, while Monaco are on the verge of all but winning the French league.
results.title: Juventus miss chance to seal Serie A after losing to Roma

results.description: Cristiano Ronaldo scores two late goals as Real Madrid - who had Gareth Bale sent off - come from 3-1 down to draw with Las Palmas.
results.title: Real Madrid 3-3 Las Palmas

results.description: Follow live text coverage from La Liga as Barcelona host Sporting de Gijon followed by Real Madrid facing Las Palmas.
results.shortTitle: Real Madrid 3-3 Las Palmas - Real snatch draw with Bale sent off
results.title: La Liga: Barcelona v Sporting de Gijon & Real Madrid v Las Palmas

results.description: A l'issue des matchs de ce dimanche 5 février, Lionel Messi, le métronome du FC Barcelone s'est hissé à la tête du classement des meilleurs buteurs de la Liga avec 16 réalisations.
results.title: Football : les meilleurs buteurs de la Liga

thumbnail.altText: Lionel Messi, le maître à jouer du FC Barcelone est meilleur butteur du championnat espagnol avec 16 réalisations en même temps que son coéquipier Luis Suarez
